full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR MDOR BSDUS DANG, ,GSANG BDE 'JIGS GSUM GYI MNGON RTOGS SNYING POR SGRIL BA DE, ,MDO SNGAGS KYI LAM YONGS RDZOGS LA SHAR SGOM BYA TSUL DANG, ,YI DAM CHOS SRUNG SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR CHOS RGYAL LHA MO LCAM SRING BCAS LA GTOR 'BUL 'PHRIN BCOL DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010B (CES PA 'DI NI 'JAM MGON BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED A'AKYA HU THOG THU BLO BZANG 'JAM MGON DBYANGS RGYA MTSOS G'A SAR SLOB SBYONG BYED SKABS KHA TON DU BYED RGYUD RGYUR RJE BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR MDOR BSDUS DANG, GSANG BDE 'JIGS GSUM GYI MNGON RTOGS SNYING POR SGRIL BA DE, CHOS BSRUNG SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR CHOS RGYAL PHYI SGRUB, DMAG ZOR MA, LCAM SRING BCAS LA GTOR 'BUL 'PHRIN BCOL RE DANG, LAM YONGS RDZOGS LA SHAR BSGOM BYAS CHOG PA'I SMON TSIG MJUG TU BKRA SHIS DANG BCAS PA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS 'JAM MGON SNYAN RGYUD KYI MAN NGAG 'DZIN PA DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS PHO BRANG CHEN PO PO TA LA'I GZIMS CHUNG BDE BA CAN DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DI KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS THAMS CAD DU 'PHEL ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
